Education

    • Thesis: Portable and Synchronized Distributed Learning Management System in Severe Networked Regions
    • Publication:

      • Incremental Synchronization Implementation on Survey using Hand Carry Server Raspberry, IEICE technical report: 117.65 (2017): 21-24

    • Disertation: Development of a Lossy Online Mouse Tracking Method for Capturing User Interaction with Web Browser Content
    • Publication:
    • Implementation of real-time online mouse tracking on overseas quiz session From server administrator point of view, Journal of Education and Information Technologies, Online First, Page 1-22, 6 March 2020.
